mapper.select: SELECT ri.assignee_id AS id, fi.`name` AS `name` FROM fs_user_member_info fi, r_redmine_user_info ri WHERE fi.`name` = REPLACE ( ri.user_name, ' ', '' ) AND ri.redmine_type = 2 AND fi.resign = 0 AND fi.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY CONVERT(fi.`name` USING GBK)

SELECT u.assignee_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, u.date AS spentOn, t.hours AS hours FROM ( SELECT t.*, IF(uc.member_id IS NULL, 0, 1) flag FROM ( SELECT ru.assignee_id, ru.user_name, sh.date FROM fs_user_member_info fu, r_redmine_user_info ru, s_holiday_config sh WHERE resign = 0 AND fu.`name` = ru.user_name AND fu.is_delete = 0 AND ru.is_delete = 0 AND sh.`work` = 1 AND ru.redmine_type = 2 AND sh.date >= #{beginOfMonth} AND sh.date <= #{yesterday} ) t LEFT JOIN s_reminder_user_conf uc ON uc.`name` = t.user_name AND (t.date BETWEEN uc.start_date AND uc.end_date or `enable` = 1) ) u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT userId, userName, SUM( hours ) hours, spentOn FROM `rd_time_entry` WHERE spentOn BETWEEN #{beginOfMonth} AND #{yesterday} GROUP BY userId, userName, spentOn ) t ON t.userId = u.assignee_id AND t.spentOn = u.date WHERE u.date <= #{yesterday} AND (t.hours < 8 OR t.hours IS NULL) AND u.flag = 0
